app.title: Supplementary Materials
app.p: The following are available online at https://www.mdpi.com/2076-393X/8/2/324/s1, Figure S1: The average daily milk per DIM of 21,844 cows in 77 dairy cattle farms in Israel for lactation group 1 (Lac 1), lactation group 2 (Lac 2), lactation group >2 (Lac > 2). Three stages for each lactation group: Lac 1: 1. 0 ≤ DIM ≤ 91 2. 92 ≤ DIM ≤ 484 3.DIM ≥ 485. Lac 2: 1. 0 ≤ DIM ≤ 41 2. 42 ≤ DIM ≤ 458 3. DIM ≥ 459. Lac > 2: 1. 0 ≤ DIM ≤ 50 2. 51 ≤ DIM ≤ 399 3. DIM ≥ 400.
